course_description: Selected reading from the Hebrew Bible with a focus on standard narrative prose with the goal of acquiring greater facility with vocabulary and grammatical-syntactical constructions. This course may be repeated for credit when the reading selections vary.
prerequisites: This requirement mandates BL511 and BL512 as prerequisites
schedule_location: WF 9:30am-10:50am in Rita Anne Rollins Building_401
sections: Class Nbr: 5025, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: WF 9:30-10:50a, Instructor: E. McDonnell, Status: Open
